feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.51.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: introduce replace connections and show flows using connection dialog (#7484) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: add a new flow operation to update metadata (#7482) @felipetio

üß© Pieces

  • feat(Gslide): generate from template new props placeholder (#7514) @Kevinyu-alan
  • feat(straico): add RAG actions and API integration for Straico (#7523) @dennisrongo
  • feat(dust): upload file piece (#7518) @TimPetricola
  • feat(claude): add extended thinking mode (#7467) @kishanprmr
  • fix(slack): fix trigger for private channel (#7487) @kishanprmr
  • feat(backblaze): upload file, read file actions and new file trigger (#7511) @nhnansari
  • feat(straico): add file upload, update image generation, update prompt completion (#7494) @dennisrongo
  • feat(google-tasks): add due date property to Add Google task action (#7495) @AnkitSharmaOnGithub

üêû Bug Fixes

  • chore: skip validation for missing connections in project release (#7522) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: show resend verification email if user signs in with unverified email (#7519) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: login using Google without popup (#7516) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: timeout should be handled by exit too (#7515) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add TimPetricola as a contributor for code (#7520) @allcontributors
  • docs: add nhnansari as a contributor for plugin (#7517) @allcontributors
  • docs: add AnkitSharmaOnGithub as a contributor for plugin (#7513) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AnkitSharmaOnGithub, @Kevinyu-alan, @TimPetricola, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @dennisrongo, @felipetio, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @nhnansari

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.52.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: wait for next webhook and improve testing webhooks experience (#7544) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • feat(store): bulk add items in list (#7437) @kishanprmr
  • fix(apitable): fix API baseurl (#7526) @kishanprmr
  • feat(text-ai): add reasoning models (#7550) @kishanprmr
  • feat(straico): add new agent actions (#7529) @dennisrongo
  • feat(rss): new trigger, take a list of feed (#7462) @Kevinyu-alan

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: Improve UX for testing MCP trigger (#7521) @Gamal72
  • fix: listing worker id (#7540) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • fix(connection): add flows count column, improve delete confirmation dialog (#7541) @hazemadelkhalel

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore(deps-dev): bump vite from 6.2.6 to 6.3.4 (#7530) @dependabot
  • security: upgrade fastify from 4.28.1 to 4.29.1 (#7534) @abuaboud
  • [Snyk] Security upgrade fastify from 4.28.1 to 4.29.1 (#7543) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Gamal72, @Kevinyu-alan, @abuaboud, @dennisrongo, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.52.1
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: introduce tables releases (#7504) @hazemadelkhalel

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@hazemadelkhalel

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.52.2
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: naming of indices for mcp piece entity (#7578) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: add migration to make externalId non-nullable in flow entity (#7568) @abuaboud
  • fix: improve worker management and error handling (#7562) @abuaboud
  • fix: show localhost for mcp server url if no public instance url is set (#7564) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • fix: enhance naming of used flows in connections page (#7573) @hazemadelkhalel

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud and @hazemadelkhalel

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.52.3
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(Copy.ai): run workflow, get workflow status/output actions and workflow completed trigger (#7512) @AnkitSharmaOnGithub
  • feat(metabase): get graph action modifications (#7527) @Kevinyu-alan
  • feat(netsuite): get vendor and get customer actions (#7525) @geekyme
  • feat(google-docs): add placeholder format choice for edit action (#7559) @Kevinyu-alan
  • feat(twin-labs): new API url and new polling process (#7555) @alegria-solutions
  • feat(dust): add support for EU region (#7551) @AdamSelene
  • feat(jina-ai): add jina-ai piece (#7501) @denieler

üõ†Ô∏è Piece Framework

  • feat: custom auth markdown property (#7565) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: update flows on connection merge without republish (#7583) @hazemadelkhalel

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: simplify app connection (#7595) @abuaboud
  • refactor: simplify app connection replacement (#7594) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @AnkitSharmaOnGithub, @Kevinyu-alan, @abuaboud, @alegria-solutions, @denieler, @geekyme, @hazemadelkhalel and @kishanprmr
